descriptions.File Operations: Commands for managing files in Vim
descriptions.Screen Movement: Commands for moving the screen view
descriptions.Insert Mode: Commands for entering and exiting insert mode
descriptions.Editing: Commands for modifying and editing text
descriptions.Copy/Paste: Commands for copying, cutting and pasting text
descriptions.Search and Replace: Commands for searching and replacing text
descriptions.Visual Mode: Commands for visual mode and text selection
descriptions.Marks and Jumps: Commands for bookmarks and jumps in text
descriptions.Macros: Commands for recording and executing macros
